m_szDocSumamry: News:Archive:2010:June Click here for most recent news. 2010 News:Archive:2010:July - going forward in time June Feature : Electromagnetic > Newman Motor > Joseph Newman's 'runs itself' motor demonstration in Denton TX - On Saturday, June 26, 2010, Joseph Newman held a 'historic event' demonstration in Denton, TX in which he showed a 3 ton electric motor plus load, in an arrangement that he claimed "basically runs itself".  Travis Norman attended and estimates the motor efficiency at between 95 and 125 percent. (PESN; June 30, 2010) ( Comment ) Flight > Flying Cars > Terrafugia Transition > Te
